Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE show_to_client = show_to_client and  p.ar_user_id = 27
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE show_to_client = show_to_client and  p.ar_user_id = 26

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'

WHERE show_to_client = show_to_client and  p.ar_user_id = 27
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE show_to_client = show_to_client and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE show_to_client = show_to_client and  p.ar_user_id = 9

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE show_to_client = show_to_client and  p.ar_user_id = 29

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

WHERE show_to_client = show_to_client and  p.ar_user_id = 27
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE show_to_client = show_to_client and  p.ar_user_id = 27

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 27
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 27

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'

 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

                    showUserDocumentsToAgent = '0'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'C',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '140000',
        approver_comments ='Very recently he has taken two property loan and just started paying EMI. The CLTL is more than 90% which makes it riskier since monthly commitment of the customer is very high. Pls do it carefully.',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '562'
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 25

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 9

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',

    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'B',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '500000',
        approver_comments ='',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '565'

    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and 1 = 1

                SET borrower_name='Sandeep Bhikaji lad', initials='', mobile_number='91587 02002',
                    email='', city='Hingoli ', vehicle_name='Cruiser', model='2010',
                    loan_amount='300000.00', co_applicant_name='', 
                    co_applicant_mobile='', co_applicant_relationship='spouse', 
                    status='8',
                    referred_by = 'Jai motors finance ',
                    product_type = 'vehicle_loan',
                    kilometers_driven = '',
                    userComment = '',
                    agentComment = '',
                    showUserCommentToAgent = '0',
                    showUserDocumentsToAgent = '0'

                WHERE id = '570'
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',

    p.city AS 'City',

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
4 - 8
KINDLY ATTACHED VEHICLE IMAGES, - 
Applicant is doing job in Hotel Royal Govindam in Jaipur from last 2 years and getting 25K PM salary. Applicant also live in same hotel. He has one Innova Taxi which is finance by SK Finance. Applicant belongs to Degana, Nagaur.  - 
Update Proposal UPDATE proposals 
                SET borrower_name='Vijendra Singh', initials='', mobile_number='8247409806',
                    email='', city='Jaipur', vehicle_name='Hyundai I20 Active CRDI SX', model='2015',
                    loan_amount='350000.00', co_applicant_name='', 
                    co_applicant_mobile='', co_applicant_relationship='', 
                    status='8',
                    referred_by = 'Teertha Associates',
                    product_type = 'vehicle_loan',
                    kilometers_driven = '',
                    userComment = 'VEHICLE PHOTOS NOT THERE SIR, ALREDAY 5 DAYS TO GO THATS WHY I SEND IT WITHOUT PROPER DOCUMENTS,',
                    agentComment = 'Applicant is doing job in Hotel Royal Govindam in Jaipur from last 2 years and getting 25K PM salary. Applicant also live in same hotel. He has one Innova Taxi which is finance by SK Finance. Applicant belongs to Degana, Nagaur. ',
                    showUserCommentToAgent = '0',
                    showUserDocumentsToAgent = '0'

                WHERE id = '391'
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 27
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 27
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 30
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 38
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 38
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '11', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = '',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '0',
        approved_amount = '',
        approver_comments ='OK',
        approver_closed_comments ='OK 2'
        WHERE id = '573'
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'

                WHERE id = '573'
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

FROM proposals p

    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1

Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'A',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '0',
        approved_amount = '500000',
        approver_comments ='OK 2',
        approver_closed_comments ='OK 2 2'
        WHERE id = '573'
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 27

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

    p.city AS 'City',

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 29

Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'C',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '400000',
        approver_comments ='High defaults and write off. Pls make sure that the verification done properly.',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '571'
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 11
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 11

    p.created_by AS 'Created By',

    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p

 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id

    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
