Update Proposal UPDATE proposals 
                SET borrower_name='RIFAD F', initials='', mobile_number='0',
                    email='', city='CHENNAI', vehicle_name='MARUTI SUZUKI', model='2013',
                    loan_amount='0.00', co_applicant_name='', 
                    co_applicant_mobile='', co_applicant_relationship='', 
                    status='8',
                    referred_by = 'vijayalakshmi',
                    product_type = 'vehicle_loan',
                    kilometers_driven = '0',
                    userComment = '',
                    agentComment = '',
                    showUserCommentToAgent = '0',
                    showUserDocumentsToAgent = '0'

                WHERE id = '576'
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 35
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 11
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 11
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 11
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

    ps.status_name AS 'Status',

    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'

        ELSE 'Other'

LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'

    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'C',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '250000',
        approver_comments ='Nothing in cibil except one loan taken very recently.All depends on your inspection. Pls do it carefully. Vehicle will be 4th owner, we can not maintain high LTV for this case.',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '391'

    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 29

Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '12', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'B',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '',
        approver_comments ='Although Customer is not defaulter but following points to be noted.
There very small and very freauent borrowings in the range of 4000 to 5000 rupees. 
His loan ticket size is 18000 for 38 loans which is not matching for BMW. too many loans too small amount.
In last one moth too many enquiries including 8 enquiries for car loan itself which makes this proposal a riskier one
What we need
we need to check KMs of the vehicle. (If above 1 Lakh kms pls avoid the case)
Lease agreement of rooms
house details own/ rented and photos.
The loan amount can not exceed 8 lakhs considering market resale of this car considering buyer will be 4 th owner. 
',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '572'

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 30

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',

    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id

 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',

    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

    u.full_name AS 'User',

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 13
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1

        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and 1 = 1

    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 26
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id

        ELSE 'Other'

    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',

    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

FROM proposals p

 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 29

    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',

    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 11
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 11

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 10
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',

    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 27
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',

    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 27
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 26
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 26

Update Proposal UPDATE proposals 
                SET borrower_name='Hema.B', initials='', mobile_number=' 90031 23974',
                    email='', city='Chennai ', vehicle_name='Maruti Swift desire ', model='2019',
                    loan_amount='400000.00', co_applicant_name='Balaji ', 
                    co_applicant_mobile='9600686050', co_applicant_relationship='spouse', 
                    status='4',
                    referred_by = 'Varsha motors ',
                    product_type = 'vehicle_loan',
                    kilometers_driven = 'Nil',
                    userComment = 'kindly attached kyc sir',
                    agentComment = '',
                    showUserCommentToAgent = '0',
                    showUserDocumentsToAgent = '0'

                WHERE id = '587'
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
