    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',

        ELSE 'Other'

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 31
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1

    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1

    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',

    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'

INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id

 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 25

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 25

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',

        ELSE 'Other'

    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',

    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',

    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',

    approved_category,

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 25

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

    p.id,

    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '10', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = '',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '',
        approver_comments ='There are suit filed cases and write offs pls avoid',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '575'
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1

Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'B',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '285000',
        approver_comments ='',
        approver_closed_comments ='Gadi ka condition thoda avg hone ki vajah se 2.85 hi kar payenge'
        WHERE id = '581'

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1

    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9

        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'

        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 35

    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 11
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',

    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (8) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Lock values Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 10

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 10
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 10

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',

    approved_category,

        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,

    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',

    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 25
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 9

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 9
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',

    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',

    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (9,10,12,13) and  p.ar_user_id = 29

    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    , COALESCE(u2.full_name, 'NOT ALLOCATED') AS 'Allocated To'
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
 JOIN users u2 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u2.id AND u2.id = 7
WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and 1 = 1

    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
