        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 29

        ELSE 'Other'

INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 33
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 33

INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 33
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (1,2) and  p.ar_user_id = 33

    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 26
Proposal Query SELECT
    p.id,
    u.full_name AS 'User',
    COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
    DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%d-%b-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS created_at,
    p.created_by AS 'Created By',
    p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name',
    p.city AS 'City',
    p.product_type AS 'Product Type',
    CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle',
    p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount',
    p.approved_amount AS 'Approved Amount',
    ps.status_name AS 'Status',
    p.status AS 'StatusID',
    approved_category,
    
    CASE
        WHEN p.status IN (1, 2) THEN 'New'
        WHEN p.status IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 14) THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN p.status IN (9, 10, 12, 13) THEN 'Processed'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Main Status'

    
FROM proposals p
INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id

WHERE p.status IN (3,4,5,6,7,8,11,14) and  p.ar_user_id = 26
Proposal Query 
    SELECT 
        p.id, 
        u.full_name AS 'User', 
        COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
        COALESCE(u4.full_name, 'Not Allocated') AS 'Allocated To',
        p.created_by AS 'Created By', 
        p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name', 
        p.city AS 'City', 
        p.product_type AS 'Product Type', 
        CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle', 
        p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount', 
        p.approved_amount as 'Approved Amount',
        p.approved_category as 'Category',
        ps.status_name AS 'Status',
        p.status AS 'StatusID',
        p.userComment,
        p.agentComment,
        CONCAT(p.approver_comments, ' ', p.approver_closed_comments) AS final_comment

    FROM proposals p 
    INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
    INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
    LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
    LEFT JOIN users u4 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u4.id
    WHERE 1=1
    

Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = '',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '225000',
        approver_comments ='',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '584'
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '10', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = '',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '',
        approver_comments ='There are few write off cases and also high defaults are there. Customer base is in Arni. Better to avoid',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '606'
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'B',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '425000',
        approver_comments ='',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '600'
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'C',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '125000',
        approver_comments ='Customer have small profile and also highly defaulted for a two wheeler loan. Pls note condition of the vehicle is also not goods. ',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '602'
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'B',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '850000',
        approver_comments ='',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '599'
Proposal Query 
    SELECT 
        p.id, 
        u.full_name AS 'User', 
        COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
        COALESCE(u4.full_name, 'Not Allocated') AS 'Allocated To',
        p.created_by AS 'Created By', 
        p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name', 
        p.city AS 'City', 
        p.product_type AS 'Product Type', 
        CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle', 
        p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount', 
        p.approved_amount as 'Approved Amount',
        p.approved_category as 'Category',
        ps.status_name AS 'Status',
        p.status AS 'StatusID',
        p.userComment,
        p.agentComment,
        CONCAT(p.approver_comments, ' ', p.approver_closed_comments) AS final_comment

    FROM proposals p 
    INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
    INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
    LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
    LEFT JOIN users u4 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u4.id
    WHERE 1=1
    

Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '9', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'B',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '0',
        approved_amount = '1250000',
        approver_comments ='',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '596'
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '12', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'C',
        approved_on = now(),
        show_to_client = '1',
        approved_amount = '1000000',
        approver_comments ='Customer have high defaults with some accounts are with severe defaults. Pls do a strict inspection and send us the report along with  house photos and send us',
        approver_closed_comments =''
        WHERE id = '593'
Approve Proposal UPDATE proposals SET 
        status = '12', 
        reject_reason_text = '', 
        approved_category = 'C',
        approved_on = now(),

Lock values Proposal Query 
    SELECT 
        p.id, 
        u.full_name AS 'User', 
        COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
        COALESCE(u4.full_name, 'Not Allocated') AS 'Allocated To',
        p.created_by AS 'Created By', 
        p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name', 
        p.city AS 'City', 
        p.product_type AS 'Product Type', 
        CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle', 
        p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount', 
        p.approved_amount as 'Approved Amount',
        p.approved_category as 'Category',
        ps.status_name AS 'Status',
        p.status AS 'StatusID',
        p.userComment,
        p.agentComment,
        CONCAT(p.approver_comments, ' ', p.approver_closed_comments) AS final_comment

    FROM proposals p 
    INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
    INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
    LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
    LEFT JOIN users u4 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u4.id
    WHERE 1=1
    

Proposal Query 
    SELECT 
        p.id, 
        u.full_name AS 'User', 
        COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
        COALESCE(u4.full_name, 'Not Allocated') AS 'Allocated To',
        p.created_by AS 'Created By', 
        p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name', 
        p.city AS 'City', 
        p.product_type AS 'Product Type', 
        CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle', 
        p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount', 
        p.approved_amount as 'Approved Amount',
        p.approved_category as 'Category',
        ps.status_name AS 'Status',
        p.status AS 'StatusID',
        p.userComment,
        p.agentComment,
        CONCAT(p.approver_comments, ' ', p.approver_closed_comments) AS final_comment

    FROM proposals p 
    INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
    INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
    LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
    LEFT JOIN users u4 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u4.id
    WHERE 1=1
    AND p.created_at >= '2025-07-01'

Proposal Query 
    SELECT 
        p.id, 
        u.full_name AS 'User', 
        COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
        COALESCE(u4.full_name, 'Not Allocated') AS 'Allocated To',
        p.created_by AS 'Created By', 
        p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name', 
        p.city AS 'City', 
        p.product_type AS 'Product Type', 
        CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle', 
        p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount', 
        p.approved_amount as 'Approved Amount',
        p.approved_category as 'Category',
        ps.status_name AS 'Status',
        p.status AS 'StatusID',
        p.userComment,
        p.agentComment,
        CONCAT(p.approver_comments, ' ', p.approver_closed_comments) AS final_comment

    FROM proposals p 
    INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
    INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
    LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
    LEFT JOIN users u4 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u4.id
    WHERE 1=1
    AND p.created_at BETWEEN '2025-07-01' AND '2025-07-19'

Proposal Query 
    SELECT 
        p.id, 
        u.full_name AS 'User', 
        COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
        COALESCE(u4.full_name, 'Not Allocated') AS 'Allocated To',
        p.created_by AS 'Created By', 
        p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name', 
        p.city AS 'City', 
        p.product_type AS 'Product Type', 
        CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle', 
        p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount', 
        p.approved_amount as 'Approved Amount',
        p.approved_category as 'Category',
        ps.status_name AS 'Status',
        p.status AS 'StatusID',
        p.userComment,
        p.agentComment,
        CONCAT(p.approver_comments, ' ', p.approver_closed_comments) AS final_comment

    FROM proposals p 
    INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
    INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
    LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
    LEFT JOIN users u4 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u4.id
    WHERE 1=1
    AND p.created_at >= '2025-07-01'

Proposal Query 
    SELECT 
        p.id, 
        u.full_name AS 'User', 
        COALESCE(u3.full_name, 'No Agent') AS 'Agent Name',
        COALESCE(u4.full_name, 'Not Allocated') AS 'Allocated To',
        p.created_by AS 'Created By', 
        p.borrower_name AS 'Borrower Name', 
        p.city AS 'City', 
        p.product_type AS 'Product Type', 
        CONCAT(p.vehicle_name, ' - ', p.model) AS 'Vehicle', 
        p.loan_amount AS 'Loan Amount', 
        p.approved_amount as 'Approved Amount',
        p.approved_category as 'Category',
        ps.status_name AS 'Status',
        p.status AS 'StatusID',
        p.userComment,
        p.agentComment,
        CONCAT(p.approver_comments, ' ', p.approver_closed_comments) AS final_comment

    FROM proposals p 
    INNER JOIN users u ON p.created_by = u.id
    INNER JOIN proposal_status_master ps ON p.status = ps.status_id
    LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.ar_user_id = u3.id
    LEFT JOIN users u4 ON p.allocated_to_user_id = u4.id
    WHERE 1=1
